info.title: Dev01 Paysol Proxy Web REST
info.description: REST API specifications for Payments and Accounts.

parameters.name: paymentID
parameters.description: A guaranteed unique identifier for payment transactions. This ID is generated only once for a payment, and all subsequent events and commands should use this ID.

200.description: Successful response returning payment in XML format

application/xml.example: <pay:Payments xmlns:pay="http://dint.arbfile.org/payment/v2"> <pay:Payment> <pay:PaymentId>6b609012-3467-47c5-901c-5ea04fa8e629</pay:PaymentId> <pay:Amount>3700</pay:Amount> <pay:PaymentStatus>PENDING</pay:PaymentStatus> <pay:Payer> <pay:Cocode>04513</pay:Cocode> <pay:Subsid>0002</pay:Subsid> <pay:CompanyName>ALPHA INSURANCE OF FLORIDA</pay:CompanyName> <pay:ClaimNumber>VEN-0920241800-D-C</pay:ClaimNumber> <pay:Insured> <pay:FirstName>VEN</pay:FirstName> <pay:LastName>DEM</pay:LastName> <pay:InsuredType>Personal</pay:InsuredType> <pay:Vehicle/> </pay:Insured> </pay:Payer> <pay:Payee> <pay:Cocode>04514</pay:Cocode> <pay:Subsid>0002</pay:Subsid> <pay:CompanyName>BETA INSURANCE OF COLORADO</pay:CompanyName> <pay:ClaimNumber>VEN-0920241800-R-C</pay:ClaimNumber> <pay:Insured> <pay:FirstName>VEN</pay:FirstName> <pay:LastName>RESP</pay:LastName> <pay:InsuredType>Personal</pay:InsuredType> <pay:Vehicle/> </pay:Insured> </pay:Payee> <pay:IncidentState>FL</pay:IncidentState> <pay:IncidentDate>2024-09-16-04:00</pay:IncidentDate> <pay:UnknownPaymentSource> <pay:SourceName>TRS</pay:SourceName> <pay:SourceId>4641</pay:SourceId> </pay:UnknownPaymentSource> <pay:PaymentActivity> <pay:activity> <pay:Action>REQUEST</pay:Action> <pay:ActivityDate>2024-09-21T17:10:46-04:00</pay:ActivityDate> <pay:ResultingStatus>REQUESTED</pay:ResultingStatus> </pay:activity> <pay:activity> <pay:Action>ACCEPT</pay:Action> <pay:ActivityDate>2025-07-01T11:56:27-04:00</pay:ActivityDate> <pay:ResultingStatus>PENDING</pay:ResultingStatus> </pay:activity> </pay:PaymentActivity> </pay:Payment> </pay:Payments>

parameters.name: paymentID
parameters.description: A guaranteed unique identifier for payment transactions. This ID is generated only once for a payment, and all subsequent events and commands should use this ID.

200.description: Successful response returning payment in XML format

application/xml.example: <pay:Payments xmlns:pay="http://dint.arbfile.org/payment/v2"> <pay:Payment> <pay:PaymentId>6b609012-3467-47c5-901c-5ea04fa8e629</pay:PaymentId> <pay:Amount>3700</pay:Amount> <pay:PaymentStatus>PENDING</pay:PaymentStatus> <pay:Payer> <pay:Cocode>04513</pay:Cocode> <pay:Subsid>0002</pay:Subsid> <pay:CompanyName>ALPHA INSURANCE OF FLORIDA</pay:CompanyName> <pay:ClaimNumber>VEN-0920241800-D-C</pay:ClaimNumber> <pay:Insured> <pay:FirstName>VEN</pay:FirstName> <pay:LastName>DEM</pay:LastName> <pay:InsuredType>Personal</pay:InsuredType> <pay:Vehicle/> </pay:Insured> </pay:Payer> <pay:Payee> <pay:Cocode>04514</pay:Cocode> <pay:Subsid>0002</pay:Subsid> <pay:CompanyName>BETA INSURANCE OF COLORADO</pay:CompanyName> <pay:ClaimNumber>VEN-0920241800-R-C</pay:ClaimNumber> <pay:Insured> <pay:FirstName>VEN</pay:FirstName> <pay:LastName>RESP</pay:LastName> <pay:InsuredType>Personal</pay:InsuredType> <pay:Vehicle/> </pay:Insured> </pay:Payee> <pay:IncidentState>FL</pay:IncidentState> <pay:IncidentDate>2024-09-16-04:00</pay:IncidentDate> <pay:UnknownPaymentSource> <pay:SourceName>TRS</pay:SourceName> <pay:SourceId>4641</pay:SourceId> </pay:UnknownPaymentSource> <pay:PaymentActivity> <pay:activity> <pay:Action>REQUEST</pay:Action> <pay:ActivityDate>2024-09-21T17:10:46-04:00</pay:ActivityDate> <pay:ResultingStatus>REQUESTED</pay:ResultingStatus> </pay:activity> <pay:activity> <pay:Action>ACCEPT</pay:Action> <pay:ActivityDate>2025-07-01T11:56:27-04:00</pay:ActivityDate> <pay:ResultingStatus>PENDING</pay:ResultingStatus> </pay:activity> </pay:PaymentActivity> </pay:Payment> </pay:Payments>

parameters.name: paymentID
parameters.description: A guaranteed unique identifier for payment transactions. This ID is generated only once for a payment, and all subsequent events and commands should use this ID.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: intended version of API to access

200.description: Successful response returning payment in XML format

application/xml.example: <pay:Payments xmlns:pay="http://dint.arbfile.org/payment/v2"> <pay:Payment> <pay:PaymentId>6b609012-3467-47c5-901c-5ea04fa8e629</pay:PaymentId> <pay:Amount>3700</pay:Amount> <pay:PaymentStatus>PENDING</pay:PaymentStatus> <pay:Payer> <pay:Cocode>04513</pay:Cocode> <pay:Subsid>0002</pay:Subsid> <pay:CompanyName>ALPHA INSURANCE OF FLORIDA</pay:CompanyName> <pay:ClaimNumber>VEN-0920241800-D-C</pay:ClaimNumber> <pay:Insured> <pay:FirstName>VEN</pay:FirstName> <pay:LastName>DEM</pay:LastName> <pay:InsuredType>Personal</pay:InsuredType> <pay:Vehicle/> </pay:Insured> </pay:Payer> <pay:Payee> <pay:Cocode>04514</pay:Cocode> <pay:Subsid>0002</pay:Subsid> <pay:CompanyName>BETA INSURANCE OF COLORADO</pay:CompanyName> <pay:ClaimNumber>VEN-0920241800-R-C</pay:ClaimNumber> <pay:Insured> <pay:FirstName>VEN</pay:FirstName> <pay:LastName>RESP</pay:LastName> <pay:InsuredType>Personal</pay:InsuredType> <pay:Vehicle/> </pay:Insured> </pay:Payee> <pay:IncidentState>FL</pay:IncidentState> <pay:IncidentDate>2024-09-16-04:00</pay:IncidentDate> <pay:UnknownPaymentSource> <pay:SourceName>TRS</pay:SourceName> <pay:SourceId>4641</pay:SourceId> </pay:UnknownPaymentSource> <pay:PaymentActivity> <pay:activity> <pay:Action>REQUEST</pay:Action> <pay:ActivityDate>2024-09-21T17:10:46-04:00</pay:ActivityDate> <pay:ResultingStatus>REQUESTED</pay:ResultingStatus> </pay:activity> <pay:activity> <pay:Action>ACCEPT</pay:Action> <pay:ActivityDate>2025-07-01T11:56:27-04:00</pay:ActivityDate> <pay:ResultingStatus>PENDING</pay:ResultingStatus> </pay:activity> </pay:PaymentActivity> </pay:Payment> </pay:Payments>

PaymentId.description: A guaranteed unique identifier for payment transactions. This ID is generated only once for a payment, and all subsequent events and commands should use this ID.

Cocode.description: The identifier given to the member that identifies it to AF

AcceptPayment.description: Object representation of an Accept Payment model

Cocode.description: The identifier given to the member that identifies it to AF

Subsid.description: Subsidiary company code in AF’s system

ClaimNumber.description: The claim number the payment is associated with.

InsuredType.description: Indicates if coverage is personal or commercial

Party.description: Payment party either payee or payer

PaymentId.description:
This is a guaranteed unique identifier for payment transactions.
This ID is generated only once for a paymen, and all subsequent
events and commands should use this ID. Every time a new
PaymentRequested event is generated, this value will be filled
and unique.

IncidentState.description: State where the incident took place

IncidentDate.description: Date when the incident took place

ResultingStatus.description: Status of the Payment after action
